main event: An observation of a round object moving slowly across the sky was reported southwest of Bakersfield, California on June 30, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as being round and similar to a basketball,The sighting lasted for 3 minutes,The object moved straight before it descended and disappeared,Multiple conclusions were drawn regarding the object, including it possibly being a balloon or aircraft, The report took place as part of Project Blue Book.
